content:
Chapter 4's secret area is called the Purple Cloud Mountain and there are 3 bosses to fight here! Scorpionlord can be found near the Bounds of Deity's Abode Keeper's Shrine. Smash his precious pots and he'll start a fight. 

The Scorpionlord
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md", within the section "Secret Bosses in Chapter 4" and the sub-section "The Scorpionlord". The content is presented below:

Chapter 4's secret area is called the Purple Cloud Mountain and there are 3 bosses to fight here! Scorpionlord can be found near the Bounds of Deity's Abode Keeper's Shrine. Smash his precious pots and he'll start a fight. 

The Scorpionlord
